```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
sp500vis <- read_csv('sp500vis.csv')
```

```{r}
fig <- sp500vis %>% ggplot(aes(x=date, y=adj_close, color = ticker, group = ticker)) +
  geom_line() + theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Date", y = "Closing Price", title = "2019 Closing Price by Tickers")

fig
```
